text: We'll hear arguments next in 73-1313, International Telephone Telegraph Corporation against International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers Union.
Honorable Chief Justice and may it please this honorable Court.
Mr. Murray, then you don't agree with Judge Morrow's observation in his opinion and I quote, “It is apparently admitted that Section 554 applies to 10 (k) hearings.”
There is absolutely no basis in the record for that statement of Judge Morrow's.
Mr. Chief Justice, may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
